articles.content: The Angels have been carried by their lineup and both teams look to drive in runs from the first pitch. The Rockies should drive in runs at will against Tyler Anderson, who has allowed 11 runs in the… [+495 chars]

articles.title: Guardians rookie ‘clutched up’ in win against Brewers, Terry Francona says - cleveland.com
articles.description: Tanner Bibee went six innings and struck out seven to win his fourth for Cleveland.
articles.content: CLEVELAND, Ohio Tanner Bibee could have folded after an early error put the Guardians in a hole against Milwaukee on Saturday, but the rookie instead locked in and then clutched up at the end of his … [+2397 chars]

articles.author: Max Rieper
articles.title: Royals finally win a Jordan Lyles start, defeat Rays 9-4 - Royals Review
articles.description: Freddy Fermin and Edward Olivares pace the offense.
articles.content:
After 15 tries, the Royals finally won a game started by Jordan Lyles, defeating the Tampa Bay Rays 9-4 on Saturday afternoon, giving him his first win of the year.
The start got off to a shaky star… [+1651 chars]
